Headline: Blue Line Trains bypassing IL Medical District
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at UIC/Halsted due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at UIC/Halsted due to police activity.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Clinton and Racine to provide connecting service.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
